name: qrcgen
description: QR Code Generator with share links and embed snippets. Side panel workflow, offline preview, canonical URLs.

scripts.build:all: wxt build && wxt build -b firefox && wxt build -b edge && wxt build -b opera
scripts.zip:all: wxt zip && wxt zip -b firefox && wxt zip -b edge && wxt zip -b opera
scripts.check: tsc --noEmit && biome check src/ wxt.config.ts && vitest run
